text: Hi there, just wondering if there are ways to customize the list columns in the Website Pages page such that we can see more details of each page? It seems like you can do this for Contacts but not for Website Pages.

Hi <@U6W3H6YN8>. I finally gave up VSC. I prefer my Pycharm. I've searched to write a HubSpot plugin for Intelleji platform (webstorm, phpstorm, pycharm, etc.). But it's in Java (<https://www.jetbrains.org/intellij/sdk/docs/tutorials/custom_language_support_tutorial.html>). But I can code without such a plugin for now. So, the error is still present, but it's not really neither an issue: files are at least uploaded. So it's just a little feedback. And if you know someone fluent in Java, give to webstom, phpstorm, and pycharm users a HubSpot support would be very cool. :slightly_smiling_face:
